Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional worth and benefits, I am confident it aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. For this remarkable opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $1200000. This offer represents a strategic advantage, allowing you to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how this product can contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
